titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to increase the number of persons appointed to the military service academies from Guam and the Virgin Islands from nominations made by the Delegate in Congress from Guam and the Delegate in Congress from the Virgin Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

bill.summary: 5/7/2003--Introduced. Increases from two to three each year the end strength for appointments to the military service academies from Guam and the Virgin Islands from nominations made by the Delegates in Congress from Guam and the Virgin Islands.
